Name: Wisdom of the Aetherweaver
Description:
Increases magic damage dealt by 60%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Martialist
Description:
Increases damage dealt by 40%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Platebearer
Description:
Increases defense by 3,000 and maximum HP by 50%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Guardian
Description:
Increases defense by 1,800 and maximum HP by 10%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Ordained
Description:
Increases maximum MP by 50%% and healing magic potency by 25%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Skirmisher
Description:
Increases damage dealt by 20%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Watcher
Description:
Increases evasion by 25%% while reducing damage dealt by 5%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Templar
Description:
Increases healing magic potency by 50%% and maximum HP by 30%%, while reducing damage dealt by 5%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Irregular
Description:
Increases damage dealt by 30%% while reducing magic defense by 60%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Breathtaker
Description:
Increases poison resistance and movement speed, including mount speed, and increases evasion by 10%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Spirit of the Remembered
Description:
Increases maximum HP by 10%% and accuracy by 30%%.
Additional Effect: Grants a 70%% chance of automatic revival upon KO

Name: Protect L
Description: Increases the physical defense of target by 1,000.

Name: Shell L
Description: Increases the magic defense of target by 1,000.

Name: Death L
Description: KOs target. The less the target's HP, the greater the chance of success.

Name: Focus L
Description:
Grants a stack of Boost, up to a maximum of 16.
Boost Bonus: Increases potency of next weaponskill by 30%% per stack
Shares a recast timer with all weaponskills.

Name: Paralyze L
Description: Afflicts target with Paralysis.

Name: Paralyze L III
Description: Afflicts target and all neaby enemies with Paralysis.

Name: Swift L
Description: Greatly increases movement speed.

Name: Featherfoot L
Description: Increases evasion by 15%%.

Name: Spirit Dart L
Description:
Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Spirit Dart L, increasing damage taken by 8%%

Name: Catastrophe L
Description: Deals unaspected damage to all nearby enemies with a potency of 4,000, while dealing damage with a potency of 999,999 to self.

Name: Dispel L
Description: Removes one beneficial status from target.

Name: Feint L
Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Reduces target's evasion

Name: Stealth L
Description:
Blend in with your surroundings, making it impossible for most enemies to detect you, but reducing movement speed by 50%%. Has no effect on certain enemies with special sight.
Cannot be executed while in combat.
Effect ends upon use of any action other than Sprint, or upon reuse.

Name: Aetherial Manipulation L
Description:
Rush to a target's side.
Unable to cast if bound.

Name: Backstep L
Description:
Jump 10 yalms back from current position.
Cannot be executed while bound.

Name: Tranquilizer L
Description: Stuns target.

Name: Bloodbath L
Description: Converts a portion of damage dealt into HP.

Name: Rejuvenate L
Description: Instantly restores 50%% of maximum HP and MP.

Name: Haymaker L
Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.
Can only be executed immediately after evading an attack.
Additional Effect: Slow +20%%

Name: Rapid Recast L
Description: Shortens recast time for next ability used by 50%%.

Name: Cure L
Description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 9,000

Name: Cure L II
Description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 12,000

Name: Stoneskin L
Description: Creates a barrier around target that absorbs damage totaling 10%% of target's maximum HP.

Name: Cure L III
Description:
Restores HP of target and all party members nearby target.
Cure Potency: 9,000

Name: Regen L
Description:
Grants Regen to target.
Cure Potency: 2,500

Name: Esuna L
Description: Removes a single detrimental effect from target.

Name: Incense L
Description: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list and increasing enmity generation.

Name: Raise L
Description: Resurrects target to a weakened state.

Name: Bravery L
Description: Increases target's damage dealt by 10%%.

Name: Solid Shield L
Description: Reduces physical damage taken by 99%%.

Name: Spell Shield L
Description: Reduces magic damage taken by 99%%.

Name: Reflect L
Description: Creates a magic-reflecting barrier around self or party member.

Name: Smite L
Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 1,000.
Can only be executed when your HP is below 50%%.
Additional Effect: Restores an amount of own HP proportional to damage dealt

Name: Refresh L
Description: Increases the amount of magia aether regenerated over time by self and nearby party members.

Name: Banish L
Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 200.
Additional Effect: Afflicts undead targets with Banish L, increasing damage taken by 25%%

Name: Banish L III
Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Afflicts undead targets with Banish L, increasing damage taken by 25%%

Name: Magic Burst L
Description: Increases spell damage by 100%% while increasing MP cost.

Name: Double Edge L
Description:
Increases physical damage dealt while dealing damage to self over time.
Stacks increase every 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 16.
For each stack, physical damage dealt is increased by 15%%, and potency of damage dealt to self increases by 1,200.

Name: Eagle Eye Shot L
Description:
Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 80.
Potency increases up to 1,000%% the lower the target's HP.

Name: Perception L
Description:
Reveals all traps within a 15-yalm radius.
If no traps exist within 15 yalms, detects whether any traps are present within a 36-yalm radius.
Only effective within dungeons.

Name: Wisdom of the Elder
Description:
Increases magic damage dealt by 35%% and magic defense by 1,000, while decreasing spell MP cost.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Duelist
Description:
Increases physical damage dealt by 40%% and maximum HP by 15%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Fiendhunter
Description:
Increases physical damage dealt by 25%% and evasion by 25%%.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Wisdom of the Indomitable
Description:
Increases defense by 2,000.
Grants one stack of HP Boost each time damage equal to or greater than half of maximum HP is taken from a single-target attack.
Cannot be used with other Wisdom abilities.
Effect ends upon reuse or upon replacement of duty action.

Name: Sacrifice L
Description:
Restores all of a KO'd target's HP.
Cannot be executed if currently afflicted with Sacrifice.
Additional Effect: Inflicts Sacrifice on self
